title: Documentation refers to wrong factory classes for some suggesters
description:
The AnalyzingInfixLookupFactory class is referred to as AnalyzingInfixSuggesterFactory in the documentation. And the same goes for FreeTextLookupFactory vs FreeTextSuggesterFactory.

Apache Solr Reference Guide 4.10, pdf, p295-296: https://archive.apache.org/dist/lucene/solr/ref-guide/apache-solr-ref-guide-4.10.pdf

See correct class names here: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/4_10_1/solr-core/index.html

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
Thanks for reporting. Fixed in https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Suggester

PS: You can also report documentation bugs directly in Confluence as comments
